sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html' }) export class RegisterComponent { email: string = ''; username: string = ''; password: string = ''; confirmPassword: string = ''; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} register() { if (this.password !== this.confirmPassword) { // Passwords don't match, handle the error console.log("Passwords don't match"); return; } const registerData = { email: this.email, username: this.username, password: this.password }; this.authService.register(registerData).subscribe( response => { console.log('Registration successful', response); }, error => { console.log('Registration failed', error); } ); } }
